document.full_text: on saturday, stream of gold is entered for a $5,000 claiming race at fairmount park, in collinsville, ill.  at first glance this would appear to be a normal entry in a normal horse race in north america.  so why is this noteworthy?  stream of gold has a history.
document.title: the rail: the long, steady decline of stream of gold
lines_and_colors: on saturday, stream of gold is entered for a $5,000 claiming race at fairmount park, in collinsville, ill.  at first glance this would appear to be a normal entry in a normal horse race in north america.  so why is this noteworthy?  stream of gold has a history.
